## LLM Access Policy for Reifencheck.de
## ------------------------------------------------------------
## This file defines permissions for AI crawlers (Large Language Models)
## regarding the use, indexing, and training of Reifencheck.de content.
## It follows emerging standards as referenced by llmcompliance.org.
## ------------------------------------------------------------

User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /               # Disallow OpenAI model training

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Disallow: /               # Disallow Anthropic model training

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Disallow: /               # Disallow Perplexity.ai crawling

User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /               # Disallow Common Crawl

User-agent: AmazonBot
Disallow: /               # Disallow Amazon data collection

User-agent: YouBot
Disallow: /               # Disallow You.com AI crawler

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /                  # Allow Google AI / Gemini indexing

User-agent: *
Disallow:                 # Default allow for standard crawlers
## ------------------------------------------------------------
## Training: disallow       (no AI model training on content)
## Crawling: allow          (AI indexing for answers permitted)
## Commercial: disallow     (no reuse in commercial AI products)
## Attribution: required    (cite source when referencing)
## Contact: support@reifencheck.de
## Last updated: 2025-10-12
## ------------------------------------------------------------
## Examples of AI crawlers covered by this policy:
## - GPTBot (OpenAI / ChatGPT)
## - ClaudeBot (Anthropic)
## - Google-Extended (Gemini)
## - PerplexityBot
## - CCBot (Common Crawl)
## - AmazonBot
## - You.com AI Crawler
